Synopsis
A young refugee from the Sudanese civil war gets relocated to the United States along with other "Lost Boys of Sudan". After arriving in America, young people know Carrie (Reese Witherspoon), a social worker who, knowing they've been through, try to teach them how to function in the modern world.
